Definition: "chia kentang" is a Singlish term that refers to an Asian person who behaves like a Caucasian, especially if they can only speak English. The word "chia" means to eat in Hokkien dialect, while "kentang" means potato in Malay. The term literally means to eat potatoest. \n\nAlternate spellings include "jiak kentang".
Example: 1. He jiak kentang one, won't understand your Chinese jokes lah.
